item.title: Kimchi Udon
item.description: Ingredients 500 g Udon (fresh) 1 can Kimchi 2 tsp Gochujang 5 tbsp Butter Garnish Sesame Seeds 1 egg yellow per plate spring onion Directions Drain the kimchi, retaining the liquid. In a frying pan heat up 2 tbsp of the butter and add the kimchi and gochujang. Fry for about 4 minutes on medium heat. Add the liquid from the kimchi, remaining butter and the udon noodles and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
